clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Triticale, Mung Bean and Adzuki Bean Intervention on Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Triticale, Mung Bean and Adzuki Bean Intervention on Metabolic and Nutritional Status of Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

brief_summary.textblock: This study is designed to evaluate short term effect of triticale, mung bean and adzuki bean intervention for health improvement in patients with type 2 diabetes.

detailed_description.textblock: The study will evaluate the effect of triticale, mung bean and adzuki bean on metabolic and nutritional status of patients with type 2 diabetes after 30 days of intervention. Patients will be assigned to control or intervention group (A diet including triticale and mung bean; B diet including adzuki bean). Blood and urine samples will be collected at baseline and after 30 days of intervention.

primary_outcome.measure: response to the dietary intervention by the change from baseline in blood glucose at 30-day
response to the dietary intervention by the change from baseline in lipid profile at 30-day
response to the dietary intervention by the change from baseline in insulin resistance at 30-day

secondary_outcome.measure: response to the dietary intervention by the change from baseline in renal function at 30-day
response to the dietary intervention by the change from baseline in liver function at 30-day
response to the dietary intervention by the change from baseline in inflammation result at 30-day
response to the dietary intervention by the change from baseline in folic acid absorption at 30-day
response to the dietary intervention by the change from baseline in iron absorption at 30-day

arm_group.description: M1: triticale and mung bean as a processed food is assigned to patients at a dose of 50-100 g/d for 30-day dietary intervention.
M2: adzuki bean as a processed food is assigned to patients at a dose of 50-100 g/d for 30-day dietary intervention.

intervention.description: subjects are assigned to intake of triticale and mung bean for 30 days
subjects are assigned to intake of adzuki bean for 30 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Male and female patients between the ages of 30 and 65 years
2. patients has been diagnosed as type 2 diabetes mellitus
3. Patients who like to be followed up for 2 months.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Women in pregnancy or lactation.
2. Individuals with a history of severe kidney disease, cardiovascular disease, stroke, cancer, or psychological disorders.
